greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Dirichlet inverse of A064664, the inverse permutation of EKG-sequence.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..32768
Index entries for sequences related to EKG sequence
program: \\ Then its inverse A064664 is prepared:
DirInverse(v) = { my(u=vector(#v)); u[1] = (1/v[1]); for(n=2, #v, u[n] = -sumdiv(n, d, if(d<n, v[n/d]*u[d], 0))); (u) }; \\ Compute the Dirichlet inverse of the sequence given in input vector v.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 13 2019
